item.title: Making Pong with Go and WebAssembly
item.description: TL;DR For those of you in a hurry: I made a version of the classic Pong game using Go and WebAssembly. I then embedded that game on my website. here is the game, enjoy: Why WebAssembly WebAssembly is a relatively new standard on web browsers. From the Wikipedia page: The main goal of WebAssembly is to enable high-performance applications on web pages, but the format is designed to be executed and integrated in other environments as well.
